info.title: BFL API
info.description: Authorize with an API key from your user profile.

get.description: An endpoint for getting generation task result.

post.description: Submits an image generation task with FLUX 1.1 [pro].

schema.title: Response Flux Pro 1 1 V1 Flux Pro 1 1 Post

post.description: Submits an image generation task with the FLUX.1 [pro].

schema.title: Response Flux Pro V1 Flux Pro Post

post.description: Submits an image generation task with FLUX.1 [dev].

schema.title: Response Flux Dev V1 Flux Dev Post

post.summary: Generate an image with FLUX 1.1 [pro] with ultra mode and optional raw mode.
post.description: Submits an image generation task with FLUX 1.1 [pro] with ultra mode and optional raw mode.

schema.title: Response Generate Bigblue V1 Flux Pro 1 1 Ultra Post

post.summary: Generate an image with FLUX.1 Fill [pro] using an input image and mask.
post.description: Submits an image generation task with the FLUX.1 Fill [pro] model using an input image and mask. Mask can be applied to alpha channel or submitted as a separate image.

schema.title: Response Fill V1 Flux Pro 1 0 Fill Post

post.summary: Generate an image with FLUX.1 Canny [pro] using a control image.
post.description: Submits an image generation task with FLUX.1 Canny [pro].

schema.title: Response Pro Canny V1 Flux Pro 1 0 Canny Post

post.summary: Generate an image with FLUX.1 Depth [pro] using a control image.
post.description: Submits an image generation task with FLUX.1 Depth [pro].

schema.title: Response Pro Depth V1 Flux Pro 1 0 Depth Post

get.description: Get details about the training parameters and other metadata connected to a specific finetune_id that was created by the user.

post.summary: Generate an image with FLUX.1 [pro] finetune
post.description: Submits an image generation task with FLUX.1 [pro] using a finetune.

schema.title: Response Flux Pro Finetuned V1 Flux Pro Finetuned Post

post.summary: Generate an image with FLUX.1 Depth [pro] finetune using a control image.
post.description: Submits an image generation task with FLUX.1 Depth [pro] finetune.

schema.title: Response Flux Pro 1 0 Depth Finetuned V1 Flux Pro 1 0 Depth Finetuned Post

post.summary: Generate an image with FLUX.1 Canny [pro] finetune using a control image.
post.description: Submits an image generation task with FLUX.1 Canny [pro] finetune.

schema.title: Response Flux Pro 1 0 Canny Finetuned V1 Flux Pro 1 0 Canny Finetuned Post

post.summary: Generate an image with FLUX.1 Fill [pro] finetune using an input image and mask.
post.description: Submits an image generation task with the FLUX.1 Fill [pro] finetune model using an input image and mask. Mask can be applied to alpha channel or submitted as a separate image.

schema.title: Response Flux Pro 1 0 Fill Finetuned V1 Flux Pro 1 0 Fill Finetuned Post

get.description: List all finetune_ids created by the user

post.description: Delete a finetune_id that was created by the user

post.summary: Generate an image with FLUX 1.1 [pro] finetune with ultra mode.
post.description: Submits an image generation task with FLUX 1.1 [pro] finetune with ultra mode.

schema.title: Response Generate Bigblue Finetuned V1 Flux Pro 1 1 Ultra Finetuned Post

control_image.title: Control Image
control_image.description: Base64 encoded image to use as control input if no preprocessed image is provided

preprocessed_image.title: Preprocessed Image
preprocessed_image.description: Optional pre-processed image that will bypass the control preprocessing step

canny_low_threshold.title: Canny Low Threshold
canny_low_threshold.description: Low threshold for Canny edge detection

canny_high_threshold.title: Canny High Threshold
canny_high_threshold.description: High threshold for Canny edge detection

prompt_upsampling.title: Prompt Upsampling
prompt_upsampling.description: Whether to perform upsampling on the prompt

steps.title: Steps
steps.description: Number of steps for the image generation process

output_format.description: Output format for the generated image. Can be 'jpeg' or 'png'.

guidance.title: Guidance
guidance.description: Guidance strength for the image generation process

safety_tolerance.title: Safety Tolerance
safety_tolerance.description: Tolerance level for input and output moderation. Between 0 and 6, 0 being most strict, 6 being least strict.

webhook_secret.title: Webhook Secret
webhook_secret.description: Optional secret for webhook signature verification

finetune_id.title: Finetune Id
finetune_id.description: ID of the fine-tuned model you want to delete.

finetune_strength.description: Strength of the fine-tuned model. 0.0 means no influence, 1.0 means full influence. Allowed values up to 2.0

canny_low_threshold.description: Low threshold for Canny edge detection

webhook_secret.title: Webhook Secret
webhook_secret.description: Optional secret for webhook signature verification

finetune_details.title: Finetune Details
finetune_details.description: Details about the parameters used for finetuning

finetune_id.title: Finetune Id
finetune_id.description: ID of the fine-tuned model you want to use.

finetune_strength.title: Finetune Strength
finetune_strength.description: Strength of the fine-tuned model. 0.0 means no influence, 1.0 means full influence. Allowed values up to 2.0

image.title: Image
image.description: A Base64-encoded string representing the image you wish to modify. Can contain alpha mask if desired.

mask.title: Mask
mask.description: A Base64-encoded string representing a mask for the areas you want to modify in the image. The mask should be the same dimensions as the image and in black and white. Black areas (0%) indicate no modification, while white areas (100%) specify areas for inpainting. Optional if you provide an alpha mask in the original image. Validation: The endpoint verifies that the dimensions of the mask match the original image.

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: The description of the changes you want to make. This text guides the inpainting process, allowing you to specify features, styles, or modifications for the masked area.

steps.title: Steps
steps.description: Number of steps for the image generation process

prompt_upsampling.title: Prompt Upsampling
prompt_upsampling.description: Whether to perform upsampling on the prompt. If active, automatically modifies the prompt for more creative generation

guidance.title: Guidance
guidance.description: Guidance strength for the image generation process

output_format.description: Output format for the generated image. Can be 'jpeg' or 'png'.

safety_tolerance.title: Safety Tolerance
safety_tolerance.description: Tolerance level for input and output moderation. Between 0 and 6, 0 being most strict, 6 being least strict.

webhook_secret.title: Webhook Secret
webhook_secret.description: Optional secret for webhook signature verification

finetune_id.title: Finetune Id
finetune_id.description: ID of the fine-tuned model you want to use.

finetune_strength.title: Finetune Strength
finetune_strength.description: Strength of the fine-tuned model. 0.0 means no influence, 1.0 means full influence. Allowed values up to 2.0

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: The prompt to use for image generation.
prompt.example: A beautiful landscape with mountains and a lake

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Optional seed for reproducibility. If not provided, a random seed will be used.

aspect_ratio.title: Aspect Ratio
aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the image between 21:9 and 9:21

safety_tolerance.title: Safety Tolerance
safety_tolerance.description: Tolerance level for input and output moderation. Between 0 and 6, 0 being most strict, 6 being least strict.

output_format.description: Output format for the generated image. Can be 'jpeg' or 'png'.

image_prompt.title: Image Prompt
image_prompt.description: Optional image to remix in base64 format

image_prompt_strength.title: Image Prompt Strength
image_prompt_strength.description: Blend between the prompt and the image prompt

prompt_upsampling.title: Prompt Upsampling
prompt_upsampling.description: Whether to perform upsampling on the prompt. If active, automatically modifies the prompt for more creative generation

webhook_secret.title: Webhook Secret
webhook_secret.description: Optional secret for webhook signature verification

file_data.title: File Data
file_data.description: Base64-encoded ZIP file containing training images and, optionally, corresponding captions.

finetune_comment.title: Finetune Comment
finetune_comment.description: Comment or name of the fine-tuned model. This will be added as a field to the finetune_details.

trigger_word.title: Trigger Word
trigger_word.description: Trigger word for the fine-tuned model.

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Mode for the fine-tuned model. Allowed values are 'general', 'character', 'style', 'product'. This will affect the caption behaviour. General will describe the image in full detail.

learning_rate.title: Learning Rate
learning_rate.description: Learning rate for fine-tuning. If not provided, defaults to 1e-5 for full fine-tuning and 1e-4 for lora fine-tuning.

captioning.title: Captioning
captioning.description: Whether to enable captioning during fine-tuning.

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: Priority of the fine-tuning process. 'speed' will prioritize iteration speed over quality, 'quality' will prioritize quality over speed.

finetune_type.title: Finetune Type
finetune_type.description: Type of fine-tuning. 'lora' is a standard LoRA Adapter, 'full' is a full fine-tuning mode, with a post hoc lora extraction.

lora_rank.title: Lora Rank
lora_rank.description: Rank of the fine-tuned model. 16 or 32. If finetune_type is 'full', this will be the rank of the extracted lora model.

webhook_secret.title: Webhook Secret
webhook_secret.description: Optional secret for webhook signature verification

image_prompt.title: Image Prompt
image_prompt.description: Optional base64 encoded image to use as a prompt for generation.

width.title: Width
width.description: Width of the generated image in pixels. Must be a multiple of 32.

height.title: Height
height.description: Height of the generated image in pixels. Must be a multiple of 32.

steps.title: Steps
steps.description: Number of steps for the image generation process.

prompt_upsampling.title: Prompt Upsampling
prompt_upsampling.description: Whether to perform upsampling on the prompt. If active, automatically modifies the prompt for more creative generation.

guidance.title: Guidance
guidance.description: Guidance scale for image generation. High guidance scales improve prompt adherence at the cost of reduced realism.

safety_tolerance.title: Safety Tolerance
safety_tolerance.description: Tolerance level for input and output moderation. Between 0 and 6, 0 being most strict, 6 being least strict.

output_format.description: Output format for the generated image. Can be 'jpeg' or 'png'.

webhook_secret.title: Webhook Secret
webhook_secret.description: Optional secret for webhook signature verification

finetunes.title: Finetunes
finetunes.description: List of finetunes created by the user

tags.name: Utility
tags.description: These utility endpoints allow you to check the results of submitted tasks and to manage your finetunes.

tags.name: Tasks
tags.description: Generation task endpoints. These endpoints allow you to submit generation tasks.
